name: @porsche-design-system/react
author: Dr. Ing. h.c. F. Porsche AG

scripts.build: npm run clean:build && npm run build:react-wrapper && npm run build:react-ssr-wrapper && npm run build:nextjs && npm run build:remix && npm run build:react-router
scripts.build:react-wrapper: rollup -c ./projects/react-wrapper/rollup.config.js --bundleConfigAsCjs && npm run build:subPackages:tailwindcss && npm run build:typings && chmod +x dist/react-wrapper/bin/patchRemixRunProcessBrowserGlobalIdentifier.js
scripts.build:typings: DEST=./dist/react-wrapper && SRC=$DEST/esm && mv $SRC/jsdom-polyfill/index.d.ts $DEST/jsdom-polyfill/index.d.ts && rm -rf $SRC/jsdom-polyfill && mv $SRC/partials/index.d.ts $DEST/partials/esm/index.d.ts && rm -rf $SRC/partials && mv $SRC/styles/index.d.ts $DEST/styles/esm/index.d.ts && mv $SRC/styles/vanilla-extract/index.d.ts $DEST/styles/vanilla-extract/esm/vanilla-extract/index.d.ts && rm -rf $SRC/styles && mv $SRC/testing/index.d.ts $DEST/testing/index.d.ts && rm -rf $SRC/testing && npm run build:typings:ag-grid
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:vrt
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:react-wrapper && npm run test:unit:react-ssr-wrapper
scripts.clean:build: rm -rf ./dist && npm run clean:build --workspace=@porsche-design-system/nextjs && npm run clean:build --workspace=@porsche-design-system/remix
